The result is a signal distribution with a broad peak near yp. = 7/2, while he background favors values of y, near 0 and z. The signal (background) processes tend to have more events with large A third potential discriminator between the signal and background is the difference in the rapidities Ay = Ynara — Ysofi Of the photons with harder and softer values of Dr in the lab frame, calculated on an event by event basis. This distribution is displayed in the lower- left frame of Fig. The background distribution peaks at the origin, while the signal is almost flat over a wide range of Ay.
